item.title: Old Bharat Jodo Yatra video goes viral as the first day of the Voter Adhikar Yatra in Bihar
item.description:
<![CDATA[This is an old video of the Bharat Jodo Yatra from Raichur, Karnataka. It dates back to October 2022.
On 17 August, 2025, Rahul Gandhi launched a Voter Adhikar Yatra in Sasaram, Bihar. The objective of the Yatra is to oppose the process of ongoing special intensive revision of the votersâ€™ list in Bihar. Leaders of the INDI alliance are also participating in it. The 16-day yatra will pass through more than twenty districts of the state and conclude on 1st September at Gandhi Maidan in Patna.
Ag...]]>
item.author: Usha Manoj
